answers.answer: i think it is a good idea to repeat amh levels again and amh wont be impacted by any medication as i know of, 1.67 is not a bad number, as long as diabetes is in control, you can always get pregnant dear. dont worry.

thanks dear.. i will get them repeated ..i know that amh levels falls as age advances but i am still keeping my hopes high.i'm just hoping that controlled sugar levels may correct my irregular cycles and ovulation process.i never thought this would happen to me.right now in a phase of denial.

question: hi my age is 30 years and my amh level is 1.67pmol/dl .. i got it done about 9 months back and i was diagnosed to be a diabetic (type 2) ... i'm married since 3 years and we never tried for a baby because of career reasons and financial worries too.now since i have started taking diabetic medication; is there any chance my amh levels can improve?should i get them repeated? what are my odds and chances to concieve...
title: amh levels
